alert.note: Alert for Meriwether; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 5:17PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Meriwether, west central Upson and northwestern Talbot Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 517 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Sunset Village, or near Thomaston, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Thomaston, Manchester, Woodland, Sunset Village, Lincoln Park, Sprewell Bluff State Park, Crest, Pleasant Hill, Raleigh, Sunnyside and Hannahs Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
